msbt.message: Hey there, ! I, uhI think I had something to say just now Oh yeah! Nope. There it goes again. Gahaha!
Hey, ! Now, listen here a minuteHmm Guess the old noodle is a bit soggy today. I have no idea what I was going to say!
What's that now? Whaddaya need from me? <10_4 />Wait, did I need something from YOU? But you came and talked to me, right? Or was it the other way around? Gah! Forget about it!
Oh boy. I just completely forgot what I was gonna ask you.Well, it probably wasn't important. And if it was Well, I can always get mad about it later! Gahaha!
